steps: Take US 75 South toward downtown Dallas
Park at a DART park and ride along the DART Red Line
Take the southbound Red Line toward downtown / Westmoreland station
Get off the train at Pearl/Arts District station
Board the eastbound Green Line toward Buckner Station
Get off the train at Fair Park Station
Take I-35 North toward downtown Dallas
Park at Hampton Station Park and Ride
Board the northbound Red Line to Parker Road Station
Get off the train at West End Station
Board the eastbound Green Line toward Buckner Station
Get off the train at Fair Park Station
Take I-30 East toward Dallas/Fort Worth
Park at the Fort Worth T&P Station
Board the eastbound TRE train toward Dallas
Get off the TRE at Victory Station
Board the Green Line toward Buckner Station
Get off the train at Fair Park Station
Take Interstate 35E South toward Dallas
Park at the DART North Carrolton/Frankford Station Park and Ride
Board the southbound DART Green Line train toward Buckner Station
Get off the train at Fair Park Station
Take I-45 north toward Dallas
Park at the DART Lawnview Station Park and Ride
Board the northbound Green Line train toward North Carrolton / Frankford Station
Get off the train at Fair Park Station
Take I-30 East toward Dallas/Fort Worth
Park at DART's Rowlett Station Park and Ride
Take the southbound Blue Line train toward UNT Dallas Station
Get off the train at Pearl/Arts District station
Board the southbound DART Green Line train toward Buckner Station
Get off the train at Fair Park Station
